name: viima beanie
notes:
***a little holiday gift for you! i'm so grateful for all your support along the years. thank you! wishing you a wonderful holiday season!***

---

simple beanies are always my favorites and *viima beanie* is no exception. in all the simplicity, it’s a big favorite of mine this winter. i just adore the yarn used on this one, partially because this color is so beautiful!

similar to my *oak beanie* from last year, *viima beanie* is knitted from the brim up in beautiful bulky weight yarn. it’s even perfect for last minute gifts.

---


**materials**
**yarn:** 1 (1) skein of suoma chunky by kässäkerho pom pom (100% wool; 130 yds (120 m) / 150 g). approx. 100 (130) yds / 90 (120) m of bulky weight yarn. sample is knitted in color muste (dark
blue) and in size 1.
**needles:** us 11 [8 mm] circular needle, 16” [40 cm] long and dpns, or longer circular needle if using magic loop technique.
**other:** a stitch marker and locking stitch markers, tapestry needle and blocking aids.

**sizing**
1 (2)
**finished measurements:** 16 (18)” / 40 (45) cm in circumference at brim and 14” / 35 cm long.
